H1308.def: = stream; ◄ territory of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלִשְׁתִּי>}; ► location where some of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s men rested while the rest continued their pursuit of those who raided {L:Ziklag<SDBH:צִקְלַג>}

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5066.def: = state in which objects are close to other objects in space

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H1100.def: possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence:  = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H5337.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from a situation where it could be damaged

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H5090.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or animals to journey from one place to the other, whether with force or not

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H1416.def: = a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H2506.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H2505.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide an object (or range of objects) into portions; ► usually with the intention to use one or more of these portions for a particular purpose

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4605.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H2706.def: = specific actions required by somebody in authority

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6860.def: = town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}; ► belonged to {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>} and given to {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} before he moved to {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>} where he was made king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

81.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1008.def: = town and cult centre, also referred to as {L:Beth-Aven<SDBH:בֵּית אָוֶן>} or simply {L:Aven<SDBH:אָוֶן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}, near the border of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H7418.def: = hard stony substance secreted by certain colonial marine animals as an external skeleton, typically forming large reefs; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable

H5045.def: =  an area of land located in the south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples - initially by the Canaanites in {L:Arad<SDBH:עֲרָד>} and the {L:Amelekites<SDBH:עֲמָלֵקִי>}, later, the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3492.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6177.def: = town, better known as {L:Aroer<SDBH:עֲרֹועֵר>}; ◄ territory of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7017.def: = ethnic group; ◄ possibly descendants of {L:Cain<SDBH:קַיִן>}; ► ally of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; associated with {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}' father-in-law

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3565.def: = town, ◄ also known as {L:Ashan<SDBH:עָשָׁן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} or {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}, exact location unknown; ► for Levites; received part of the loot that {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} took on his raids

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2275.def: = town, formerly known as {L:Kiriath-Arba<SDBH:קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
